system.effect: The blast tears the leg from the body in a geyser of gore, sending him crashing to the ground, blood pumping from the ragged stump. This grievous wound is instantly fatal.

description.value:
Explosive Damage to Leg (Severity 8)

The blast tears the leg from the body in a geyser of gore, sending him crashing to the ground, blood pumping from the ragged stump. This grievous wound is instantly fatal.
